channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Gives Russia Less Than Two Weeks to End Its War in Ukraine
item.description: President Trump said he had decided to shorten a 50-day deadline he had given Russia to end the conflict or face punishing new sanctions.

item.title: Trump lands trade deal with EU. And, Pete Buttigieg on what's next for Democrats
item.description: Trump announced a trade deal with the European Union yesterday, which is lower than the 30% previously threatened. And, Pete Buttigieg discusses where...

item.title: France Criticizes E.U.’s Trade Deal With Trump
item.description: Some French cabinet members have aired their sharp disapproval of the deal, including the country’s prime minister who called it “a dark day.”

item.title: Do 'work requirements' in Medicaid work? Georgia's been trying it for two years

item.title: Don't wait for the Perseids in August — look for meteors this week

item.title: Rural Oklahoma kids were getting more counselors — then federal cuts pulled funding

item.title: Thai-Cambodian Conflict Tears at Remnants of a Once-Proud Empire
item.description: People on both sides of the border share a cultural heritage much older than modern nation-states, dating back to the ancient Khmer civilization.
